entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 AM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 2:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: WNW 20 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:59 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 1:59 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 1:59 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
